name: Beef and Vegetable
description: A quick and healthy dish featuring tender beef and colorful vegetables stir-fried in savory sauce.
instruction:
Step 1: Slice beef and vegetables.
Step 2: Marinate beef with soy sauce and garlic.
Step 3: Stir-fry beef until browned.
Step 4: Add vegetables and cook until tender.
Step 5: Serve with steamed rice.

name: Chicken Caesar Salad
description: Crispy romaine lettuce tossed with grilled chicken, croutons, and Caesar dressing.
instruction:
Step 1: Grill chicken breasts.
Step 2: Chop lettuce and prepare croutons.
Step 3: Toss all ingredients with Caesar dressing.
Step 4: Top with grated Parmesan and serve.

name: Classic Pancakes
description: Fluffy pancakes perfect for breakfast, served with syrup or fruit.
instruction:
Step 1: Mix flour, baking powder, sugar, and milk.
Step 2: Add eggs and whisk until smooth.
Step 3: Pour batter onto hot griddle.
Step 4: Flip when bubbles form and cook until golden.
Step 5: Serve with syrup.

name: Spaghetti Bolognese
description: Traditional Italian pasta with rich meat sauce.
instruction:
Step 1: Sauté onions and garlic.
Step 2: Add ground beef and cook until browned.
Step 3: Add tomato sauce and simmer.
Step 4: Boil spaghetti.
Step 5: Serve sauce over pasta with Parmesan.

name: Mango Smoothie
description: A refreshing smoothie made with ripe mango, yogurt, and honey.
instruction:
Step 1: Peel and dice mangoes.
Step 2: Blend with yogurt and honey until smooth.
Step 3: Pour into glass and serve chilled.

name: Tofu with Vegetables
description: This light and wholesome vegetarian dish features golden-brown tofu cubes stir-fried with fresh, crisp vegetables like broccoli, carrots, and onions. Seasoned with a savory blend of soy sauce, garlic, salt, and pepper, this meal offers a satisfying combination of textures and flavors — from the tender tofu to the crunchy veggies. It’s quick to prepare and pairs beautifully with steamed rice, making it an ideal choice for a healthy lunch or dinner. With its vibrant colors and simple yet delicious taste, this stir-fry is a nutritious addition to any meal plan.
image_url: assets/images/20250611_172403-Vegetable Tofu Stir-Fry with Peppers & Broccoli- Last Ingredient.jpg
ingredients:
• 200g tofu
  • 100g broccoli
  • 1/2 carrot
  • 1/2 onion
  • 1 tablespoon cooking oil
  • Seasonings: soy sauce, salt, pepper, garlic
